tooltip: Select Queen Midoro as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Midoro focuses on exploring the land and uncovering enemies.
Allows you to summon Queen Midoro, a flying support hero.
All Gohma units have increased Line of Sight.
Mothulas have an increased chance to spawn a Morth with their attacks.
Mothulas can pay resources to grow wings.
